column2:
"Everyone, thanks for coming!
Today I'm going to put my body and soul into singing some HOT songs for you guys!"

"I'll sing cheerfully, furiously, and vividly! I hope you guys get excited as well. Let's go!
"Our Fighting!""

"You guys seem pretty excited! That makes me happy. Really happy!
And it's all thanks to you guys. Thank you!"

"When you're depressed or you feel down, try to remember my songs!
They'll definitely make you feel better!"
"Alrighty. See you guys later!"
"Sometimes "I" will pause for a moment and wonder "Why" I am here."
"Occasionally, everyone may find themselves doing the same..."
"Feeling "Pain" in their heart. Having "Fake" smile even when the pain doesn't dissipates..."
"You can't lie to yourself about how you truly feel."
"A dark shadow looms over the path you want to believe in. You etch yesterday into your mind and focus on tomorrow. Even if you hide..."
""You are Shouting　So, Never Alone" I can hear your voice clearly no matter how far away you screamed from."
""You are Fighting... Forever Lasting" Let's become a vivid light and keep fighting!"
"The reason to keep on living life is because of "Love" and I will always be ready for it."
"Even on a lonely night."
"Even a raised "Fist" can be opened to "Fit" and help someone"
"Never forgetting it will become a warm bond to hold on."
"The tears that run down your face are the proof that you're earnestly moving forward. You don't need to be ashamed of them."
""We are Sharing　So, Never Alone" I can feel your prayers even without your voice. Let's aim to pierce the skies."
""We are Shining... Forever Lasting" Staring ahead."
"Let's take hands and chase after the dazzling, true light."
""You are Shouting　So, Never Alone" Your voice is reaching my deepest heart."
""You are Fighting... Forever Lasting""
" let's become a vivid light and keep fighting!"
"Our Fighting！"
"Kuhna"

"みんなー、来てくれてあっりがとー！
今日も全身全霊、魂込めて、あっついあの歌、歌うからね－！"

"明るく、激しく、鮮烈にっ！みんなも盛り上がって、いこーっ！
『Our Fighting！』"

"みんなー、盛り上がったかなー！あたしは満足、大っ満足っ！
みんなのおかげだよ、ありがとーっ！"

"落ち込んだときや挫けそうなとき、あたしの歌を思い出してみてね！
きっとみんなの力になるはずだよ！"
"それじゃ、またねーっ！"

"ここにいる“I”その意味を
問いかける“Why?”そんな瞬間があるよね"
"誰も 時には不意に"

"胸にある“Pain”その傷み
笑っても“Fake”作り微笑いじゃ癒えない"
"本当の気持ちには嘘はつけない"

"信じてたい道に影落とす闇
刻んだ昨日　見据えた明日　もし隠しても"

"You are Shouting　So, Never Alone　きみの叫びは
ちゃんと届いているよ　どんな遙かな崖からも"

"You are Fighting…Forever Lasting　命焦がして
今、明るく激しい鮮烈な光になれ　闘って!"

"生きてゆく“Life”その理由の
答えには“Love”いつも用意していたいね"
"たとえ孤独な夜も"

"振り上げた“Fist”拳さえ
開いたら“Fit”誰かささえて包む"
"あったかい絆になること　忘れない"

"頬伝わる涙たちは　真摯に
歩んでいる証　少しも恥じなくていい"

"We are Sharing　So, Never Alone　きみの祈りは
黙ってても感じるよ　天を突く頂めざそう"
"We are Shining…Forever Lasting　瞳凝らして"
"ただ眩く正しい誠実な光を追え　手に手取って"

"You are Shouting　So, Never Alone　きみの叫びは
ちゃんと届いているよ　心の奥　深く強く"
"You are Fighting…Forever Lasting　命焦がして"
"今、明るく激しい鮮烈な光になれ　闘って!"
"Our Fighting！"
"クーナ"
